means: 精力充沛的，充满活力的
精力旺盛的，精神饱满的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"积极的，活跃的"之意。
means: active ：指有活动能力，强调与消极或休止相反的积极活动状态。
energetic ：提精力充沛、奋力从事某事业。
vigorous ：指不仅表现积极、有生气，而且固有精力和活力十分旺盛。
brisk ：指动作敏捷、充满活力、轻快活泼地从事某项工作或活动。
lively ：侧重支轮船快，机智，有生气。

sentence.Network_en: We look for applicants who are numerate, computer-literate and energetic self-starters.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们对求职者的要求是具备运算能力，熟练使用电脑，精力充沛而且工作积极主动。

sentence.Network_en: British history of the 19th century is peopled by energetic reformers.
sentence.Network_cn: 19世纪英国史上积极改革者层出不穷。

sentence.Network_en: Aaron Copland was an energetic promoter of American music.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿伦·科普兰从来都是美国音乐的积极倡导者。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文面试常见问题 ... overqualified 资历过高的 energetic 精力充沛的, 积极的 managerial 管理的.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... enemy n. 敌人；敌军 energetic a. 精力旺盛的 energy n. 精力，能量.
精字所表达的不同意思各组一个词_百度知道 ... [spirit; vigor] 他的精气神儿总是特别足 [energetic] 精力充沛 [quaint] 精致巧妙.
英文面试常见问题 ... overqualified 资历过高的 energetic 精力充沛的, 积极的 managerial 管理的.

list.abs: endpoint 端点energetic inequality 能量不等式energy 能量
发明是... ... 发放[ provide;grant] 发奋[ work energetically;exert oneself] 发奋图强[ make a determined effort to do well].
的能量体（energetic body ）的一种伸展，不是一种分开的想像的格网，而是你的能量体的实际结构。
end-on collision 同向碰撞，尾追碰撞energetic particle 高能粒子energy 能量，能

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'powerfully effective'): from Greek energētikos, from energein 'operate, work in or upon' (based on ergon 'work')

encyclopedia.content: 形容词 a. 1.精力旺盛的；精神饱满的 He is an energetic tennis player. 他是个精力充沛的网球手。 2.有力的；积极的 an energetic campaigner in the cause of women's lib 一位妇女解放事业的大力倡导者

entry.tran: 充满活力的;精力充沛的;积极主动的
entry.def: If you are energetic in what you do, you have a lot of enthusiasm and determination.

example.ex: Blackwell is 59, strong looking and enormously energetic...
example.tran: 布莱克韦尔59岁，身体强壮且精力极其充沛。

example.ex: The next government will play an energetic role in seeking multilateral nuclear disarmament.
example.tran: 下届政府将积极寻求多边核裁军。

entry.tran: （人）精力旺盛的;（活动）剧烈的，费力气的
entry.def: An energetic person is very active and does not feel at all tired. An energetic activity involves a lot of physical movement and power.

means.word_mean: 1. possessing or exerting or displaying energy;

sentences.sentence: "an energetic fund raiser for the college"

means.word_mean: 2. working hard to promote an enterprise

auth_sentence.content: It is down to earth, young, energetic.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is down to earth, young, energetic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is down to earth, young, energetic.

auth_sentence.content: They are also known for their energetic live shows.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are also known for their energetic live shows.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are also known for their energetic live shows.

auth_sentence.content: Maurois, by contrast, was energetic and vibrant.
auth_sentence.res_content: Maurois, by contrast, was energetic and vibrant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maurois, by contrast, was energetic and vibrant.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精力旺盛的;积极的;有力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: energy[n.活力,精力;能,能量]+etic属于……的→energetic精力旺盛的
an无+ergy能量,活动→n.[医]无反应力,无力
en进入+ergy能量,活动→充满力量
energy[n.活力,精力;能,能量]+ize表动词→energize给与……能量
apology辩解,道歉+etic属于……的→apologetic道歉的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精力旺盛的;积极的;有力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: energy活力,精力+etic属于……的→energetic精力旺盛的
kin运动+etic属于……的→adj.动力[学]的;活动的
peri周围+pat拍+etic属于……的→走遍→巡游
splen=spleen+etic属于……的→adj.脾气暴的,易怒的
sympathy同情+etic属于……的→sympathetic有同情心的
sympathy同情+etic属于……的→sympathetic有同情心的

means.word_mean: 精力充沛的, 充满活力的,需要能量的,积极的

sentences.cn: 他体质强健, 精力充沛。

sentences.en: I don't feel energetic enough to rush about, so I'll sit down.
sentences.cn: 我感到没有力气东奔西跑, 我想坐下来。

jushi.english: He is an energetic supporter of the peace movement.
jushi.chinese: 他是一名和平运动的热心支持者。

jushi.english: He took energetic steps to fulfil his plan.
jushi.chinese: 他采取了有力的措施来完成他的计划。

jushi.english: I never saw such an energetic man.
jushi.chinese: 我从没见过精力这么充沛的人。
